The claim originated from a Facebook pos: 2021, which included a file photo of Pfizer-BioNTech vaccine vials.
Public health authorities in Norway disc: but they stated that no direct causal link had been established between the vaccine and the deaths.
The Norwegian Institute of Public Health: NIPH) emphasized that fatal incidents among severely frail patients following vaccination do not imply a causal relationship between the vaccine and death.
Medical experts: including Dr. Sara Viksmoen Watle from NIPH and Steinar Madsen from the Norwegian Medicines Agency, highlighted that the elderly individuals who died had existing serious illnesses and were frail, suggesting that their deaths may not be directly related to the vaccine.
